item.title: Welcome To Silver Stag Tech's blog
item.description: This is the first post that states what the blog is and why I want to work on it. Welcome to Silver Stag’s Tech blog Why For too long the tutorials, talks and demos have been based on hello world and nothing more. You are left thinking how do I actually make use of this in real life. In this blog I want to share with you more meaningful talks, tutorials, demos and my general ramblings.
